title: Intl.RelativeTimeFormat
description: The `Intl.RelativeTimeFormat` JS object formats relative time phrases, such as '2 days ago' or 'in 3 months', according to locale-specific conventions.
content: The object that formats relative time phrases, such as '2 days ago' or 'in 3 weeks', according to locale-specific conventions. Itâ€™s useful for displaying time in a human-friendly format.
